tag_list: entrepreneur, jon-carder, mojopages, clientshop, eheaven, austin-ventures
overview: Jon Carder is a serial entrepreneur. In college Jon founded eHeaven.com, an online e-commerce superstore that was purchased by BabyUniverse in 2002. Jon Carder then founded Client Shop inc. which was San Diego’s fastest growing company in 2005 (San Diego Business Journal) and was sold to Internet Brands in 2006. Currently Jon is the founder and C.E.O. of MojoPages.com, an online local search engine which received $5M (series A) from Austin Ventures.
